name: Driving Highway - Car Simumlat
description:
Driving Highway - Car Simumlator is most extreme free car racing simulator. Drive the most furious racing and sports cars at illegal speeds, drift all around the almost-endless widest open city ever seen on a mobile game, and race the traffic.
- Physics driven real car damage.
- Extreme Drive from an interior cockpit view with real km/h or mph speed meter!
- New upgrade system: Upgrade your vehicle until it can climb any hill!
